meanings.definition: The act or process of making something into a ritual.
meanings.sent1: The ritualizations of their morning routine brought a sense of order to their day.
meanings.sent2: She observed the ritualizations of the ceremony with curiosity.
meanings.sent3: The ritualizations of his bedtime routine included a dance before brushing his teeth.
meanings.sent4: The ritualizations of the ancient tribe were passed down through generations.
meanings.sent5: The intricate ritualizations of the tea ceremony were mesmerizing to watch.

meanings.definition: The result of making something into a ritual.
meanings.sent1: The beautiful ritualizations of the wedding symbolized their commitment.
meanings.sent2: The ritualizations of the event added a sense of tradition to the occasion.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected ritualizations of the recipe experiment made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The ritualizations of the garden reflected the care and attention of the gardener.
meanings.sent5: The ritualizations of the performance left a lasting impression on the audience.
